meanings.sent1: The circadian rhythm helps regulate our sleep-wake cycle.
meanings.sent2: She followed a circadian schedule, waking up and going to bed at the same times every day.
meanings.sent3: The circadian alarm clock played bird sounds to gently wake her up each morning.
meanings.sent4: His circadian patterns were as predictable as the rising and setting of the sun.
meanings.sent5: The circadian nature of the tides mirrored the ebb and flow of his energy levels.
